roleset.name: to engage in or spread gossip
roleset.note: NATTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'natter' based on sentences in ebc. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'gossip'. (from natter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: verb
example.text: * Knit and Natter in the online Cafe for tips, gossip, events, updates.

example.name: adjective
example.text: Now whose alliterave phrase was nattering nabobs of negativism *T*-1 Mr. Safire?
